name: Room Escape
summary:
🔍Join Our Discord: discord.gg/vGYjuPcRMM

Step into the mysterious world of Victorian England with our thrilling micro-escape game. As a private detective, you’ll be transported back to the Dickensian town of 1893, where unrest and confusion reign supreme. Follow the trail of a ten-year-old unsolved case, and unravel the secrets of the ancient house.

Immersive Experience
First-Person Narrative:** Travel back to the 1890s of Britain, feel the pure British atmosphere from a first person...
